attributes.action: Open disclosure on the reason for going to Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel we have not been provided with enough information on the real reasons for going to war in Iraq. Perhaps if the public where enlightened on the real reasons then we may be able to better understand the reasoning.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
